name: Venify
description: Venify is the most secure and reliable way to launch, invest, and audit any blockchain project. Our platform is designed to be the go-to IDO Launchpad for cryptocurrency startups across all major blockchains. Your tokens belong to your project and community, not our wallets. Venify deviated from the industry standard of taking a percentage of your token supply as a condition for launching an IDO. Venify mission is to revolutionize the launchpad world by providing a premier IDO Launchpad that prioritizes your interests. Venify offers modernized and customizable smart contracts, tighter anti-scam measures, and integration of the Pitch marketing agency into our platform sets us apart from the competition. We aim to provide more services and greater functionality to our users for less.
